table.name: mem
table.column:
To answer in the affirmative, say {HIja':excl} "yes" or {jISop vIneH} "I want to eat."
To answer in the negative, say {ghobe':excl} or {jISop vIneHbe'} "I don't want to eat."

Чтобы ответить утвердительно, скажите {HIja':excl} "да" или {jISop vIneH} "Я хочу есть."
Чтобы ответить отрицательно, скажите {ghobe':excl} "нет" or {jISop vIneHbe'} "Я не хочу есть."

table.name: mem
table.column:
To answer in the affirmative, say {HIja':excl} "yes" or {jItlhutlh vIneH} "I want to drink."
To answer in the negative, say {ghobe':excl} or {jItlhutlh vIneHbe'} "I don't want to drink."

Чтобы ответить утвердительно,скажите {HIja':excl} "да" или {jItlhutlh vIneH} "Я хочу пить."
Чтобы ответить отрицательно, скажите {ghobe':excl} "нет" или {jItlhutlh vIneHbe'} "Я не хочу пить."

table.name: mem
table.column: شما به من احترام می گذارید [AUTOTRANSLATED]

This phrase is used when speaking to one person. When speaking to a group of people, say {tuquvmoH.:sen@@tu-:v, quv:v, -moH:v}
If the person you're speaking to is your superior, consider adding {-neS:v:suff}.

table.name: mem
table.column: آیا من را درک می کنید؟ [AUTOTRANSLATED]
你明白我嗎？你明白我說的嗎？

table.name: mem
table.column: من شما را به اسکورت می رسانم ... [AUTOTRANSLATED]

To answer in the affirmative, say {luq:excl} "okay".
To answer in the negative, say {Qo':excl} "no, I refuse".

▶ {pa'lIjDaq qaDor.:sen:nolink} "I will escort you to your quarters." ▶ {tachDaq qaDor.:sen:nolink} "I will escort you to the bar." ▶ {vaS'a'Daq qaDor.:sen:nolink} "I will escort you to the Great Hall."

table.name: mem
table.column:
To answer in the affirmative, say {luq:excl} "okay".
To answer in the negative, say {Qo':excl} "no, I refuse".

Чтобы ответить утвердительно, скажите {luq:excl} "Окей".
Чтобы ответить отрицательно, скажите {Qo':excl} "нет, я отказываюсь".
▶ {Ha', pa'lIj wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Come, let's go to your quarters!" ▶ {Ha', tach wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Come, let's go to a bar!" ▶ {Ha', vaS'a' wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Come, let's go to the Great Hall."

▶ {Ha', pa'lIj wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Los, lass uns in dein Zimmer gehen!" ▶ {Ha', tach wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Los, lass uns zur Bar gehen!" ▶ {Ha', vaS'a' wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Los, lass uns zur Großen Halle gehen!"
▶ {Ha', pa'lIj wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Давайте, пойдём в вашу каюту!" ▶ {Ha', tach wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Давайте, пойдём в бар!" ▶ {Ha', vaS'a' wIjaH!:sen:nolink} "Давайте, пойдём в Зал Великого совета."

table.name: mem
table.column: In Klingon, this is a command rather than a question. It literally means, "Identify the languages which you speak!"
Auf Klingonisch ist dies eher ein Befehl als eine Frage. Es bedeutet wörtlich: "Identifizieren Sie die Sprachen, die Sie sprechen!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
در کلینگون ، این یک دستور است نه یک سوال. این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنی "زبانهایی را که شما صحبت می کنید مشخص کنید!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
I Klingon är detta ett kommando snarare än en fråga. Det betyder bokstavligen "Identifiera de språk du talar!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
В клингоне это скорее команда, чем вопрос. Это буквально означает: «Определите языки, на которых вы говорите!» [AUTOTRANSLATED]
在克林崗語中，這是命令而不是問題。它的字面意思是“確定您說的語言！” [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Em Klingon, isso é um comando, e não uma pergunta. Literalmente significa: "Identifique os idiomas que você fala!" [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: To ask where a person is, {ghaH:n} should be used instead of {'oH:n}. {nuqDaq ghaH ...'e'?:sen:nolink} "Where is ...?"
Um zu fragen, wo sich eine Person befindet, sollte {ghaH:n} anstelle von {'oH:n} verwendet werden. {nuqDaq ghaH ...'e'?:sen:nolink} "Wo ist ...?" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
För att fråga var en person är bör {ghaH:n} användas istället för {'oH:n}. {nuqDaq ghaH ...'e'?:sen:nolink} "Var är ...?" [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Чтобы спросить где находится человек, следует использовать {ghaH:n} вместо {'oH:n}. {nuqDaq ghaH ...'e'?:sen:nolink} "Где ...?
Para perguntar onde uma pessoa está, {ghaH:n} deve ser usado em vez de {'oH:n}. {nuqDaq ghaH ...'e'?:sen:nolink} "Onde está ...?" [AUTOTRANSLATED]

▶ {nuqDaq 'oH bIQ'a' HeH'e'?:sen} "Where is the beach?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH puchpa''e'?:sen} "Where is the bathroom?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH juHlIj'e'?:sen} "Where do you live? Where is your home?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH Qe' QaQ'e'?:sen} "Where is a good restaurant?"

▶ {nuqDaq 'oH bIQ'a' HeH'e'?:sen} "Где пляж?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH puchpa''e'?:sen} "Где ванная?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH juHlIj'e'?:sen} "Где ты живешь? Где твой дом?" ▶ {nuqDaq 'oH Qe' QaQ'e'?:sen} "Где хороший ресторан?"

table.name: mem
table.column: Where do you live? Where is your home?
Wo wohnst du? Wo ist dein Zuhause?
کجا زندگی می کنید؟ خانه شما کجاست؟ [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Var bor du? Var är ditt hem? [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Where do you live? Where is your home? [AUTOTRANSLATED]
你住在哪裡？你家在哪裡？
Onde você mora? Onde fica sua casa?

table.name: mem
table.column: I am honored to meet you.
Ich bin geehrt, dich zu treffen.
Det är en ära att få träffa dig. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

Some sources claim that {qaqIHneS} means "I am honored to meet you", but that actually means "I meet you, your honor" and is only spoken to a social superior. Other sources further compound this error by misspelling the phrase as {qaqItlhneS:sen:nolink}.

table.name: mem
table.column: O que está acontecendo? O que está acontecendo?
This sentence doesn't appear exactly in canon, but {qaStaH nuq jay'?:sen:nolink} "What the #$*@ is happening?" appears on {TKD p.177:src}.

table.name: mem
table.column: من به شما سلام می کنم! [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This is used when addressing a single person. To salute multiple people, say {Savan!:sen}
Diese Form richtet sich an eine einzelne Person. Um mehreren Personen zu salutieren, sagt man {Savan!:sen}
این در هنگام مراجعه به یک فرد مجرد استفاده می شود. برای سلام کردن به چندین نفر ، بگویید {Savan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta används när man adresserar en enda person. För att hälsa flera personer, säg {Savan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Используется для обращения к одному лицу. Чтобы приветствовать множество лиц, скажите {Savan!:sen}
稱呼一個人時使用。 {Savan!:sen}說要向多個人致敬 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso é usado ao endereçar uma única pessoa. Para saudar várias pessoas, diga {Savan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: I salute you, I salute you all!
من به شما سلام می کنم، من همه شما را تبریک می گویم [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Jag hälsar dig, jag hälsar er alla! [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Я приветствую вас, я приветствую вас всех! [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Eu vos saúdo, eu vos saúdo a todos!
This is used when addressing multiple people. To salute one person, say {qavan!:sen}
Dies wird verwendet, wenn mehrere Personen angesprochen werden. Um eine Person zu begrüßen, sagen Sie {qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این مورد در هنگام مراجعه به چندین نفر استفاده می شود. برای سلام کردن به یک نفر ، می گویند {qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta används när man adresserar flera personer. För att hälsa en person, säg {qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это используется при обращении к нескольким людям. Чтобы приветствовать одного человека, скажите {qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
在與多個人聯繫時使用。要向一個人致敬，請說{qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso é usado ao endereçar várias pessoas. Para saudar uma pessoa, diga {qavan!:sen} [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: You honor me, you all honor me.
من به شما احترام می گذارم، همه شما را به من عطا می کنند [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Du hedrar mig, alla hedrar mig. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Вы уважаете меня, вы все уважаете меня. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
你尊重我，你們都尊重我。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Você me honra, todos vocês me honram.

This phrase is used when speaking to multiple people. When speaking to one person, say {choquvmoH.:sen}
If the people you're speaking to are your superiors, consider adding {-neS:v:suff}.
You honour me, you all honour me.

table.name: mem
table.column: من زبان کلینگان را یاد می‌گیرم.

Consider using a type 7 verb suffix such as {-taH:v:suff} or {-lI':v:suff}: ▶ {tlhIngan Hol vIghojtaH.:sen:nolink} "I'm learning Klingon (ongoing)." ▶ {tlhIngan Hol vIghojlI'.:sen:nolink} "I'm learning Klingon (proceeding towards a known goal)."

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: See {qawmoH:v} for an example of how to use a verb like this one.
Siehe {qawmoH:v} für Beispiele, wie man dieses Verb verwenden kann.
برای نمونه ای از چگونگی استفاده از فعل مانند این ، به {qawmoH:v} مراجعه کنید. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Se {qawmoH:v} för ett exempel på hur man använder ett verb som det här. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Посмотрите {qawmoH:v} для примера того, как использовать глагол как этот. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
有關如何使用此類動詞的示例，請參見{qawmoH:v}。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Veja {qawmoH:v} para um exemplo de como usar um verbo como este. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. However, it follows the pattern of the other {tay:n:2} words, and is included here for reference.
Dieses Wort erscheint nicht im Kanon. Es folgt jedoch dem Muster der anderen {tay:n:2}-Wörter und ist hier als Referenz enthalten. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این کلمه در کانن ظاهر نمی شود. با این وجود ، این الگوی سایر کلمات {tay:n:2} را دنبال می کند و برای مرجع در اینجا گنجانده شده است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta ord visas inte i kanon. Men det följer mönstret för de andra {tay:n:2}-orden och inkluderas här för referens. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это слово не появляется в каноне. Тем не менее, он следует шаблону других слов {tay:n:2} и включен сюда для справки. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這個詞沒有出現在佳能中。但是，它遵循其他{tay:n:2}單詞的模式，在此包含以供參考。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Esta palavra não aparece no cânon. No entanto, segue o padrão das outras palavras {tay:n:2} e é incluído aqui para referência. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This term does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This is not canonical but is apparently widely known, after the model of {Do Qe':n}.

table.name: mem
table.column: This is not explicitly defined, but its meaning is clear from the example.
▶ {Hung buv rav:sen:nolink}: {patlh Hut:sen:nolink} "Classified Level 9 and Above"[1]
▶ {Hung buv rav:sen:nolink}: {patlh Hut:sen:nolink} "Объявленный уровень от 9 и выше"[1]

table.name: mem
table.column: "Voyage cancellation insurance" was an odd concept for Maltz, and not a term or phrase he had heard before, but he said that {leng chach mab:n:nolink} "voyage emergency contract" would be understood by Klingons to mean an agreement about who is responsible for what, if something goes wrong during a journey.

"Reiserücktrittsversicherung" war ein seltsames Konzept für Maltz und kein Begriff oder Satz, den er zuvor gehört hatte, aber er sagte, dass {leng chach mab:n:nolink} "Voyage Emergency Contract" von Klingonen als Vereinbarung darüber verstanden werden würde, wer wofür verantwortlich ist, wenn Während einer Reise geht etwas schief. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

"بیمه انصراف از سفر" برای مالتز مفهومی عجیب و غریب بود و اصطلاح یا عبارتی نبود که قبلاً شنیده باشید ، اما وی گفت که {leng chach mab:n:nolink} "قرارداد اضطراری سفر" را کلینگون می فهمید به معنای توافق درمورد اینکه چه کسی مسئول چه چیزی است ، اگر در طول سفر مشکلی پیش می آید. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

"Voyage avbeställningsförsäkring" var ett udda koncept för Maltz, och inte en term eller fras som han hade hört tidigare, men han sa att {leng chach mab:n:nolink} "resningsnödsavtal" skulle förstås av Klingons att betyda en överenskommelse om vem som är ansvarig för vad, om något går fel under en resa. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

«Страхование от отмены рейса» было странным понятием для Мальца, а не термина или фразы, которые он слышал раньше, но он сказал, что {leng chach mab:n:nolink} «контракт на экстренную поездку» будет пониматься клингонами как означающее соглашение о том, кто за что отвечает, если что-то идет не так во время путешествия. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
“航程取消保險”對於馬爾茨來說是一個奇怪的概念，不是他以前聽過的術語或短語，但是他說，克林崗斯將{leng chach mab:n:nolink}的“航程緊急合同”理解為是關於誰對什麼負責的協議，如果在旅途中出了點問題。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]

"Seguro de cancelamento de viagem" era um conceito estranho para Maltz, e não um termo ou frase que ele já ouvira antes, mas ele disse que Klingons "{leng chach mab:n:nolink}" contrato de emergência de viagem "seria entendido por Klingons como um acordo sobre quem é responsável por quê, se algo dá errado durante uma jornada. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This term has not been used in canon, but its meaning is inferred by analogy with {vatlh DIS poH:n}, etc. This entry is here for ease of reference only.
Dieser Begriff wurde im Kanon nicht verwendet, aber seine Bedeutung wird in Analogie zu {vatlh DIS poH:n} usw. abgeleitet. Dieser Eintrag dient nur zur leichteren Bezugnahme. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این اصطلاح در Canon استفاده نشده است ، اما معنای آن به قیاس {vatlh DIS poH:n} و غیره استنباط می شود. این نوشته فقط برای سهولت در مرجع است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Det här uttrycket har inte använts i kanon, men dess betydelse sluts av analogi med {vatlh DIS poH:n}, etc. Det här inlägget är här bara för att underlätta referens. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Этот термин не использовался в каноне, но его значение выведено по аналогии с {vatlh DIS poH:n} и т. Д. Эта запись приведена здесь только для удобства. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
該術語未在佳能中使用，但其含義是通過與{vatlh DIS poH:n}等類似推論得出的。此條目僅出於便於參考的目的。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Este termo não foi usado no cânone, mas seu significado é inferido por analogia com {vatlh DIS poH:n}, etc. Esta entrada está aqui apenas para facilitar a referência. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This is not canonical, but came into general use in the Terran year 2020 and is widely understood.

table.name: mem
table.column: This is not explicitly defined, but its meaning is clear from the example.

table.name: mem
table.column: This phrase does not appear in canon, but it is an obvious derivation from canonical terms.

table.name: mem
table.column: This construction doesn't appear in canon, but during a discussion of {qorghwI':n} at {Saarbrücken qepHom'a' 2013:src}, everyone immediately knew what it meant.

table.name: mem
table.column: A {yoqqoq:n@@yoq:n, -qoq:n} would, of course, be a "so-called humanoid".
البته یک {yoqqoq:n@@yoq:n, -qoq:n} یک "به اصطلاح بشردوستانه" خواهد بود. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
En {yoqqoq:n@@yoq:n, -qoq:n} skulle naturligtvis vara en "så kallad humanoid". [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon by itself, but can be inferred from {jIb yachwI':n}.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not seem to have appeared in canon, but it is obvious by analogy with {nItlhpach:n:1}.

table.name: mem
table.column: This term does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: استفاده از پسوند {-qu':v:suff} را در نظر بگیرید. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: غیر معمول، غیر معمول، نه به عنوان انتظار می رود [AUTOTRANSLATED]
необычно, нетипично, не так, как ожидалось [AUTOTRANSLATED]
出奇、異常、非典型、不如預期
invulgarmente, atipicamente, não como o esperado
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: a while back, a long time ago?
há algum tempo atrás, há muito tempo?
Erwägen Sie die Verwendung von {ben law':sen@@ben:n:1, law':v}. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
استفاده از {ben law':sen@@ben:n:1, law':v} را در نظر بگیرید. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: earlier than expected, initially, at first?
زودتر از انتظار، در ابتدا، در ابتدا؟ [AUTOTRANSLATED]
tidigare än förväntat, i början, först? [AUTOTRANSLATED]
earlier than expected, initially, at first? [AUTOTRANSLATED]
最初比起預期更早、最初？ [AUTOTRANSLATED]
mais cedo do que o esperado, inicialmente, a princípio?
This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: This word does not appear in canon. This entry is here for ease of reference only.

table.name: mem
table.column: I demand the blood of the enemy.
Ich verlange nach dem Blut des Feindes.
Eu exijo o sangue do inimigo
This sentence does not appear in canon. It is included here because it is used in some fan ceremonies.

table.name: mem
table.column: This sentence does not appear in canon. It is included here because it is used in some fan ceremonies.

table.name: mem
table.column: The body of the dead enemy lies in front of my feet.
Der Körper des toten Feindes liegt zu meinen Füßen.
بدن دشمن مرده در مقابل پاهای من قرار دارد. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Den döda fiendens kropp ligger framför mina fötter. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Тело мёртвого врага лежит перед моими ногами
死敵的屍體就在我的腳前。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
O corpo do inimigo morto está na frente dos meus pés.
This sentence does not appear in canon. It is included here because it is used in some fan ceremonies.

table.name: mem
table.column: This song is a translation of "Kiss Me" by the band Sixpence None the Richer.

table.name: mem
table.column: This song was composed by Rich Yampell, a.k.a. {HoD Qanqor:n:name,nolink}. Note that ordinarily, a rank such as {HoD:n} follows the name in Klingon, but {HoD Qanqor:n:name,nolink} comes from a region where one's rank precedes one's name.

table.name: mem
mem
mem
table.column: Você é meu amado (ente pessoas que se amam).

table.name: mem
table.column: I have accepted the crew's record of battle.
Ich habe die Schlachtaufzeichnung der Besatzung akzeptiert. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
من سابقه نبرد خدمه را پذیرفته ام. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Я принял запись экипажа о битве.
我已經接受了船員的戰鬥記錄。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Aceitei o registro de batalha da tripulação. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This is a verb with one of each type of suffix. It doesn't really mean anything.
Dies ist ein Verb mit einem Suffix jeder Art. Es hat eigentlich nichts zu bedeuten. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این فعل با یکی از هر نوع پسوند است. این به معنای چیزی نیست. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta är ett verb med en av varje typ av eftertecken. Det betyder egentligen ingenting. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это глагол с каждым из типов суффиксов. Он ничего не означает.
這是一個帶每種後綴類型的動詞。這真的沒有任何意義。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Este é um verbo com um de cada tipo de sufixo. Realmente não significa nada. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
The invention of this verbal phrase is attributed to Mark Shoulson.

table.name: mem
table.column: This sentence doesn't appear in canon. It is here for symmetry with {bImoHqu'.:sen}

table.name: mem
table.column: I now take my place as first officer.
Ich nehme jetzt meinen Platz als Erster Offizier ein. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
من اکنون جای خود را به عنوان افسر اول می گیرم. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Jag tar nu min plats som första officer. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Теперь я занимаю свое место первого офицера. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Eu agora tomo meu lugar como primeiro oficial. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This literally means "Now I assume the responsibilities of first officer."
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Jetzt übernehme ich die Verantwortung des Ersten Offiziers." [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "اکنون من مسئولیت های افسر اول را بر عهده دارم". [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "Nu påtar jag mig den första officerens ansvar." [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это буквально означает «Теперь я беру на себя обязанности первого помощника». [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這字面意思是“現在我承擔副駕駛的職責”。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso significa literalmente "Agora eu assumo as responsabilidades de primeiro oficial". [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: In {DS9 - Sons and Daughters:src}, Worf dismisses a group of crewmen with {yIghomHa'!:sen:nolink} Since he was addressing multiple people, it should have been {peghomHa'!:sen:nolink} Furthermore, since he was addressing subordinates, he should probably have used clipped Klingon, i.e., {ghomHa'!:sen:nolink}

table.name: mem
table.column: I accept your lives into my hands.
Ich nehme dein Leben in meine Hände. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
من زندگی شما را به دست من می پذیرم. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Jag accepterar dina liv i mina händer. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Я прнимаю ваши жизни в свои руки.
Eu aceito suas vidas em minhas mãos. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This is said in response to {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen} It is followed by the {no' Hol:n} phrase {Delaq Do':sen}.[1]
Dies wird als Antwort auf {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen} gesagt. Es folgt die {no' Hol:n}-Phrase {Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این در پاسخ به {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen} گفته می شود که عبارت {no' Hol:n} را دنبال می کند {Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta sägs som svar på {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen} Det följs av frasen {no' Hol:n} {Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Об этом говорится в ответе на {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen}. За ним следует фраза {no' Hol:n} {Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
據說這是對{juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen}的響應，其後是{no' Hol:n}短語{Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso é dito em resposta a {juDev 'ej Dujvam ra'wI' DagheS 'e' vItlhob.:sen}. É seguido pela frase {no' Hol:n} {Delaq Do':sen}.[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: Qual é o seu mês favorito? [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: I ask you to lead us as commander of this ship.
Ich bitte Sie, uns als Kommandeur dieses Schiffes zu führen. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
من از شما می خواهم که ما را به عنوان فرمانده این کشتی هدایت کنید. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Jag ber er att leda oss som befälhavare för detta skepp. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Я прошу вас повести нас, как командир этого корабля.
我請你帶領我們擔任這艘船的指揮官。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Peço-lhe para nos liderar como comandante deste navio. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
This literally means "I request that you lead us and that you assume the duties of commander of this ship." The response is {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1]
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Ich bitte Sie, uns zu führen und die Aufgaben des Kommandanten dieses Schiffes zu übernehmen." Die Antwort lautet {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "من از شما درخواست می کنم که ما را رهبری کنید و وظایف فرمانده این کشتی را بر عهده بگیرید." پاسخ {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1] است [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "Jag begär att du leder oss och att du åtar dig uppgifterna som befälhavare för detta fartyg." Svaret är {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это буквально означает: "Я прошу, чтобы вы повели нас и чтобы вы приняли обязанности командира этого корабля." Ответ: {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1]. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
字面意思是“我要求您領導我們，並承擔這艘船的指揮官的職責。”響應為{ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso significa literalmente "Solicito que nos lidere e assuma as funções de comandante deste navio". A resposta é {ghopDu'wIjDaq yInmeyraj vIlaj.:sen}[1] [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This literally means "I am ready to take a chance." This phrase is associated with the popular search engine {Google:url:http://www.google.com/}.
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Ich bin bereit, ein Risiko einzugehen." Dieser Satz ist mit der beliebten Suchmaschine {Google:url:http://www.google.com/} verbunden. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "من آماده شانس گرفتن هستم" هستم. این عبارت با موتور جستجوی محبوب {Google:url:http://www.google.com/} همراه است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "Jag är redo att ta en chans." Denna fras är associerad med den populära sökmotorn {Google:url:http://www.google.com/}. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Это буквально означает «я готов рискнуть». Эта фраза связана с популярной поисковой системой {Google:url:http://www.google.com/}. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
這字面意思是“我準備好機會了”。該短語與流行的搜索引擎{Google:url:http://www.google.com/}相關。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso literalmente significa "Estou pronto para arriscar". Esta frase está associada ao popular mecanismo de pesquisa {Google:url:http://www.google.com/}. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: My hovercraft is full of eels.
هواناو من پر از مارماهی است. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Min svävare är full av ålar. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Мое судно на воздушной подушке полно угрей. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
我的氣墊船上到處都是鰻魚。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Meu hovercraft está cheio de enguias.

table.name: mem
table.column: They have not finished us off.
آنها ما را تمام نکرده اند. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: Du bist meine Liebe (d.h. romantischer Partner).
Ты моя любовь, ты мой возлюленный

table.name: mem
table.column:
The verb {muSHa':v} does not necessarily indicate romantic love, for which see the noun {parmaq:n}.
Contrary to some unreliable sources, the phrase "Urkuk lu Stalga" does not mean "I love you, baby" in Klingon. In fact, it is not Klingon at all. Calling someone a baby (see {ghu:n}) is not considered a sign of affection in Klingon.

Глагол {muSHa':v} необязательно обозначает романтическую любовь, для которой смотрите существительное {parmaq:n}.
Вопреки к некоторым ненадежным источникам, фраза "Urkuk lu Stalga" не означает "Я люблю тебя малышка" на Клингонском. Фактически, это совсем не Клингонский. Называя кого-то малышкой (смотрите {ghu:n}) это не считается признаком любви.

table.name: mem
table.column: This literally means "may you enjoy your birthday!" To wish a happy birthday to multiple people, say {qoSraj botIvjaj!}
Dies bedeutet wörtlich "Mögen Sie Ihren Geburtstag genießen!" Um mehreren Personen alles Gute zum Geburtstag zu wünschen, sagen Sie {qoSraj botIvjaj!} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این به معنای واقعی کلمه به معنای "ممکن است شما از تولد خود لذت ببرید!" برای آرزوی تولدت مبارک برای چندین نفر ، بگویید {qoSraj botIvjaj!} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta betyder bokstavligen "kan du njuta av din födelsedag!" Att önska en gratulerar till flera personer, säg {qoSraj botIvjaj!} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Дословно это значит "Пусть ты насладишься твоим днём рождения!". Чтобы пожелать счастья множеству людей, скажитеsay {qoSraj botIvjaj!}
這字面意思是“祝您生日快樂！”祝多人生日快樂，請說{qoSraj botIvjaj!} [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso significa literalmente "você pode aproveitar seu aniversário!" Para desejar um feliz aniversário para várias pessoas, diga {qoSraj botIvjaj!} [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: due to your apparent minor errors
به دلیل خطاهای جزئی ظاهری شما [AUTOTRANSLATED]
på grund av dina synliga mindre fel [AUTOTRANSLATED]
devido a seus aparentes erros menores
This is used in {TKD:src} as an example of a noun with all five suffix types.
Dies wird in {TKD:src} als Beispiel für ein Substantiv mit allen fünf Suffix-Typen verwendet. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
این در {TKD:src} به عنوان نمونه ای از اسم با هر پنج نوع پسوند استفاده می شود. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Detta används i {TKD:src} som ett exempel på ett substantiv med alla fem eftertypstyper. [AUTOTRANSLATED]
В {TKD:src} используется, как пример существительного со всеми пятью суффиксами.
在{TKD:src}中使用它作為帶有所有五種後綴類型的名詞的示例。 [AUTOTRANSLATED]
Isso é usado no {TKD:src} como um exemplo de um substantivo com todos os cinco tipos de sufixos. [AUTOTRANSLATED]

table.name: mem
table.column: This is one of the example Klingon phrases on the KLI web site.
